properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:04AM PST until January 15 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Storm Warning, south winds 35 to 45 kt with
gusts up to 55 kt and seas 14 to 19 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and seas 10 to 12 feet.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Storm Warning, from 6 AM this morning to 10 PM
PST this evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 AM PST
early this morning.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Seas today will be a combination of a
diminishing northwest swell of 8 to 10 feet at 13 seconds and
rapidly building steep waves peaking near 15 feet.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
